Description: Fragment of foot and lower wall of North Ionian pottery bowl; slightly flaring ring foot; glaze fired light orange; inside glazed with added red band lined in white on floor; exterior: broad band over lower wall and outside of foot, reserved area above; underside reserved; inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.391)
